data.name: Sara Log
data.title: Medical Secretary Student

experience.title: Internship Renal Clinic, Linköping University Hospital
experience.description: My main tasks have been transcribing medical journals and other various administrative tasks.

experience.title: Internship ER, Linköping University Hospital
experience.description: Experience with the medical IT system Cosmic, transcribing medical journals and reception experience.

experience.title: Summer work Radiology Clinic, Linköping University Hospital
experience.description: For a 10 week period I transcribed referrals, medical journals and worked in the reception

experience.title: Health Centre Internship, Lambohov Linköping
experience.description: 5 week internship with experience from the IT system Cosmic, reception work and medical journal transcribing

experience.title: Municipal Child Welfare Substitute, Linköping
experience.description: I worked in three different preschools in Linköping as a substitute teacher, primarily for children between ages 1-6.

experience.title: LSS Substitute, Kumla
experience.description: I worked as a substitute in an LSS centre in Kumla. My primary task was to help the care recipients, who all suffered from different physical and mental disabilities, with daily chores and work.

experience.title: LSS Substitute, Kumla
experience.description: In the facility called Klockaren, young people with different physical and mental disabilities live. I have worked here full time during summer and part time during the semesters where my primary task has been to help the care recipients with their daily chores and work.

education.title: Medical Secretary, Vårdyrkeshögskolan Gävle
education.description: This is a two year distance program with Gävle College as base. Will graduate summer 2018.

education.title: Teamträningskolan, Kaggeholms folkhögskola
education.description: One year education with 50 % theory studies in leadership and theology and 50 % internship as youth leader in a local church in my hometown Kumla.

education.title: Child Recreation Programme, Alléskolan Hallsberg
education.description: High school (gymnasium in Swedish) education with focus on children welfare.

data.references: References can be presented upon request..
